scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --external react --external '@zomme/frame' --external '@zomme/frame/*' && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --external react --external '@zomme/frame' --external '@zomme/frame/*' --watch
scripts.lint: bun run lint:format && bun run lint:types
